response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it's worth every penny. Considering its true worth to you, we're extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $9,500. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows us to maintain the high standards of service and support you deserve. We're confident that once you experience the benefits firsthand, you'll agree that this is a fantastic opportunity. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 9500}
